# thunder_slb_hw_compress_oper (Data Source)

`thunder_slb_hw_compress_oper`: Operational Status for the object hw-compress

## Example Usage

```terraform

}

}

  value = ["${data.thunder_slb_hw_compress_oper.thunder_slb_hw_compress_oper}"]
```
